page.title: 04WESTFIELD MARINA(2), NEYLAND
page.content: The Marina is surrounded by the natural beauty of the{National Park, and on one side there is more than twenty miles of sheltered river. They mean to make the adjoining area {a sanctuary for wildlife;}and slowly it is beginning to look a lot less like mud and a little more like a natural nature reserve. They hope to increase trade by building a cafe on the quayside as people may come there for a snack or lunch. The Marina has lately had a visitor: A Chinese Junk. This boat glided magnificently into the Haven and was watched by amazed onlookers. It was on a return journey after docking at Manchester and Liverpool. At present the Marina is well established and boats are soon filling it up.
